Html:
Hello,
I have a simple Excel 2003 file that I want to copy via PHPExcel as an Excel 2003 file.

I have:

$objReader = new PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5;
$objPHPExcel = $objReader->load("a.xls");Â 
$objWriter = new PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5($objPHPExcel);
$objWriter->save("b.xls");

but afterwards the new file is empty. If I change a cell using PHPExcel, the cell is changed in the new file, but all the data from the a.xls is not there.

Thank you in advance!
The Excel 2003 reader is currently not supporting all Excel features. Try copying via file i/o functions? copy(x, y); should do the trick.

I read in another post that it is not supported at all, which I found to be true. My document has only text and 1-2 lines with formatted text. Anyway I generated it via PHPExcel from top to bottom.

Great product! Thank you.
